com.github.wuic.engine
Class Engine

java.lang.Object
  com.github.wuic.engine.Engine
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Engine>
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractAggregatorEngine, AbstractCacheEngine, CGAbstractCompressorEngine, CGTextInspectorEngine, StaticEngine
public abstract class Engine
extends Object
implements Comparable<Engine>

An engine is in charge to parse a set of files. They are generally able to parse an unique kind of path type.

WUIC framework consists of a set of Engine to be executed. They are structured using the chain of responsibility design pattern. Each engine is in charge of the execution of the next engine and could decide not to execute it.

Engines comparisons is based on their EngineType.

Since:
0.1.0
Version:
1.4
Author:
Guillaume DROUET

public Engine()
Method Detail

chain

public static Engine chain(Engine... engines)

Link the given engines. They will be linked respecting the order of the implied by their getEngineType().

If an Engine is already chained to other engines, any engine won't be added as the next engine but to the end of the existing chain.

If two different instances of the same class appear in the chain, then the first one will be replaced by the second one, keeping the original position.

Parameters:
engines - the engines
Returns:
the first engine of the given array

internalParse

protected abstract List<Nut> internalParse(EngineRequest request)
                                    throws WuicException

Internal method that parses eventually called by parse(EngineRequest) method during its invocation.

Parameters:
request - the request with files to parse
Returns:
the parsed files
Throws:
WuicException - if any kind of error occurs

getEngineType

public abstract EngineType getEngineType()

Gets the type of engine.

Returns:
the type of process done by with engine

works

public abstract Boolean works()

Returns a flag indicating if the engine is configured to do something when parse(EngineRequest) is called or not.

Returns:
true is something will be done, false otherwise

setNext

public void setNext(Engine next)

The next Engine to be execute din the chain of responsibility. If it is not set, then this Engine is the last one to be executed.

Parameters:
next - the next Engine

getNext

public Engine getNext()

the next Engine

parse

public List<Nut> parse(EngineRequest request)
                throws WuicException

Parses the given files and returns the result of this operation.

Should throw an BadArgumentException the files type is not supported by this Engine.

Parameters:
request - the request with files to parse
Returns:
the parsed files
Throws:
WuicException - if any kind of error occurs
